H0.text: The seven sisters known as the 'Pleiades' were the daughters of which legendary figure. Uranus

H1.text: The seven sisters known as the 'Pleiades' were the daughters of which legendary figure. Poseidon

H2.text: The seven sisters known as the 'Pleiades' were the daughters of which legendary figure. Helios

H3.text: The seven sisters known as the 'Pleiades' were the daughters of which legendary figure. Atlas

A4.text: He had many children, mostly daughters, the Hesperides, the Hyades, the Pleiades, and the nymph Calypso who lived on the island Ogygia.
